014package org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper;
015
016import java.lang.reflect.Type;
017import java.sql.ResultSet;
018import java.sql.SQLException;
019import java.util.Arrays;
020import java.util.HashMap;
021import java.util.Map;
022
023import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.StatementContext;
024
025/**
026 * A {@link RowMapper} implementation to easily compose existing
027 * RowMappers.  As the name implies, it is most commonly used
028 * for retrieving multiple tables' Java representations from a
029 * joined row.
030 */
031public class JoinRowMapper implements RowMapper<JoinRow> {
032
033    private final Type[] types;
034
035    private JoinRowMapper(Type[] types) {
036        this.types = Arrays.copyOf(types, types.length);
037    }
038
039    @Override
040    public JoinRow map(ResultSet r, StatementContext ctx)
041    throws SQLException {
042        return specialize(r, ctx).map(r, ctx);
043    }
044
045    @Override
046    public RowMapper<JoinRow> specialize(ResultSet r, StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
047        RowMapper<?>[] mappers = new RowMapper[types.length];
048        for (int i = 0; i < types.length; i++) {
049            Type type = types[i];
050            mappers[i] = ctx.findRowMapperFor(type)
051                    .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("No row mapper registered for " + type))
052                    .specialize(r, ctx);
053        }
054
055        return (rs, context) -> {
056            final Map<Type, Object> entries = new HashMap<>(types.length);
057            for (int i = 0; i < types.length; i++) {
058                Type type = types[i];
059                RowMapper<?> mapper = mappers[i];
060                entries.put(type, mapper.map(r, ctx));
061            }
062            return new JoinRow(entries);
063        };
064    }
065
066    /**
067     * Create a JoinRowMapper that maps each of the given types and returns a
068     * {@link JoinRow} with the resulting values.
069     * @param classes the types to extract
070     * @return a JoinRowMapper that extracts the given types
071     */
072    public static JoinRowMapper forTypes(Type... classes) {
073        return new JoinRowMapper(classes);
074    }
075}
